page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: Every morning I get up at 7.OOam to get ready for{school}.I have a wash, get dressed and then go downstairs for my breakfast.I then get on my jacket and set off for{school.}It takes me about fifteen minutes. When I get to{school}I go into assembly. After assembly I have English. I then go,at playtime,and do my duty as I am a First Aid Moniter. After play we have Maths for an hour. It is then time for dinner. We have an hours break. Then on a Monday we come back in and have History. After that we have our last play. Afterwards we carry on with History. It is then home_time. I go home and do my {homework. My Dad then comes home and we have tea. The rest of the evening I am out playing up until nine o,clock. I then come in and I go upstairs to bed.
